backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access‑controlled manga entry storage, and CRUD operations with per‑user maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested UI changes and chapter‑number fixes to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend React components, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the React app and mounts it into the root div.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker providing install/activate handlers, cache management, and fetch strategies for precache, runtime, and API requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication flow, profile setup, service‑worker registration, and rendering of the manga list.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginLogout: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing all caches on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for first‑time users to submit and save their display name profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout with collapsible sticky header, main content wrapper, and footer.
frontend/src/components/manga/ADD_MANGA_: Checklist for verifying Add Manga dialog layout, scroll behavior, and accessibility across small laptop, mobile, and tablet viewports.
frontend/src/components/manga/AddMangaDi: Form dialog for creating a new manga entry with fields for titles, genres, images, synopsis, chapters, and rating, submitting via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/manga/AutoScroll: Component that auto‑scrolls overflowing text vertically with pause-on-hover behavior.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverHover: Popup showing a manga cover and cycling titles, supporting drag-to-move, persistent position, and click-outside close.
frontend/src/components/manga/CoverImage: Field for uploading, previewing, and removing multiple cover images with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditMangaD: Dialog for editing an existing manga entry, detecting changed fields and submitting only updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/manga/EditNotesD: Dialog for editing and saving manga notes with backend readiness checks and save indicators.
frontend/src/components/manga/FloatingCo: Collapsible floating panel wrapping MangaListControls with a toggle button.
frontend/src/components/manga/GenreCheck: Displays genres in a 3-column grid with auto-measured widths and checkboxes.
Renders an interactive manga card with rating, bookmark, notes, chapter updates, and cover handling.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListC: Provides search fields, genre filter popover, bookmark toggle, sort selector, and alignment controls.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaListP: Main manga list page handling loading, filtering, sorting, pagination, and layout state.
frontend/src/components/manga/MangaRowAc: Wraps a MangaCard with edit and delete controls plus related dialogs.
frontend/src/components/manga/NotesPrevi: Portal-rendered overlay showing a preview of manga notes when hovered.
frontend/src/components/manga/Pagination: Pagination UI generating page buttons with ellipses and next/previous controls.
frontend/src/context/BackendConnectionCo: Provides a React context and provider for a singleton backend connection state and a hook to access it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithRetry.ts: Wraps the singleton backend connection hook to expose actor state with retry and error details.
frontend/src/hooks/useAllMangaEntries.ts: Fetches all manga entries from the backend with caching, offline fallbacks, and retry logic.
Manages backend actor initialization with timeouts, retries, diagnostics, and identity‑aware reset logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendConnectionS: Exposes the singleton backend connection via context to avoid multiple connection loops.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Maps the singleton backend connection state into a simplified readiness status interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useCachedCoverImageUr: Provides a cached cover image URL from IndexedDB, falling back to network and caching in the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches and updates the caller's user profile using backend connection state and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibraryGenres.ts: Derives a sorted list of unique genres from all manga entries using memoization.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaMutations.ts: Provides React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, rating, bookmarking, and editing manga entries, with backend readiness checks and error classification.
frontend/src/hooks/useMangaPage.ts: Empty file or placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistentPopupPos: Manages a popup’s position with localStorage persistence, centering, clamping, and automatic updates on resize.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniformWatchlistRo: Computes a uniform row width by measuring child elements, using ResizeObserver and image load events to update widths.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables, themes, and utility classes including gold and rainbow visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the App component.
frontend/src/sw/registerServiceWorker.ts: Registers a service worker and provides a function to clear its cache with message-based confirmation.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrorClassific: Classifies backend errors into categories with user-friendly messages and determines retry behavior.
frontend/src/utils/backendNotReadyMessag: Provides a constant backend-not-ready message and an assertion helper to enforce backend readiness.
frontend/src/utils/formatChapterNumber.t: Formats a chapter number, returning integers without decimals and decimals as-is.
frontend/src/utils/indexedDb.ts: Implements generic IndexedDB helpers for opening a DB and performing get, put, delete, and key listing operations.
frontend/src/utils/offlineCoverImageInde: IndexedDB cache for cover image blobs, with key generation, fetch/store helpers, and per‑principal cleanup.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaCache.ts: Legacy localStorage cache for manga metadata with serialization, versioning, and read/write/clear utilities.
frontend/src/utils/offlineMangaIndexedDb: IndexedDB-backed manga metadata cache namespaced per principal, supporting serialization, read/write, and clearing.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides TimeoutError and helpers to enforce time limits on promises.
frontend/src/utils/retryBackoff.ts: Implements bounded exponential backoff retries with optional timeouts and a RetryManager class.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests for adjusting MangaCard UI elements and fixing decimal chapter display.
